mapper.insert: insert into kt_gene_kegg_pathway (gene_key, pathway_key, gene_id, kegg_id) values (#{geneKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pathwayKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{geneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keggId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into kt_gene_kegg_pathway
gene_key,
pathway_key,
gene_id,
kegg_id,
#{geneKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pathwayKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{geneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{keggId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT a.gene_key geneKey, b.kegg_id keggId, b.pathway_key pathwayKey, c.pathway_name pathwayName FROM kt_gene a LEFT JOIN kt_gene_kegg_pathway b ON a.gene_key = b.gene_key LEFT JOIN kt_kegg_pathway c ON b.pathway_key = c.pathway_key where a.gene_key=#{geneKey}
